column4: ikonia:the keyboard don't work correctly, some characters don't work and show me this message "Error activating XKB configuration.
It can happen under various circumstances:
- a bug in X server (xkbcomp, xmodmap utilities)
- X server with incompatible libxkbfile implementation
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
